name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Software Engineer with 8 years of experience, I excel in designing and developing robust APIs, leveraging **Python**, **JavaScript**, and **Django** to deliver high-performance solutions. My deep understanding of localization and internationalization aligns with the needs of dynamic applications in diverse markets. I have a solid background in open-source contributions and work with cutting-edge technologies, including **Rust** and **C++**, to enhance system capabilities.
I bring extensive experience in full-stack development, employing frameworks such as **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, and **Node.js**. My proficiency in cloud environments spans **AWS** and **Azure**, ensuring scalability and security. I lead architectural strategies with a focus on microservices, event-driven systems, and CI/CD automation practices, adhering to compliance standards like HIPAA and PCI DSS. Additionally, I have hands-on expertise in machine learning pipelines and MLOps using **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow**, positioning me as a technical leader in the integration of AI/ML capabilities within enterprise solutions.
